section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Pharmaceutical product” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 3-1201.02(10A)(B)(iii).
“Practice of pharmaceutical detailing” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 3-1201.02(10A) [§ 3-1201.02(10A)(A)].
